Material used.Description: Experiments were performed using fibroblasts obtained from patients with Limb-girdle muscular dystrophy 2A.

Readout description.Result Description: qRT-PCR showed a 30% reduction in LAMA2 mRNA expression for the variant NM_001172429.2:c.1234A>G compared to wild-type controls. Immunofluorescence analysis showed a corresponding reduction in LAMA2 protein expression.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed per condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Technical replicate details were not specified in the provided scenario.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type fibroblasts were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Negative control wells without cDNA were included.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: N.D. - Statistical methods were not specified.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Less than 60% of wild type expression level.
